**Example 1: 创建sql查询**



Input: 

```
tccli dlc CreateScript --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ScriptDesc create by nick \
    --ScriptName Script1 \
    --DatabaseName testdb \
    --SQLStatement U0VMRUNUICogRlJPTSBgdGVzdGRiYC5gdGFibGUxYCBMSU1JVCAxMA==
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "eca11298-845d-4f20-af28-b3e7afd9b033"
    }
}
```
